name: Jo Van Eyck
bio: Software crafter, legacy code wrestler. I help companies get things done without shooting themselves in the foot and teach others how to do it. I use C# professionaly.

name: Jeff Bramwell
bio: I've spent the better part of my software development career in C#, though I've used a lot of languages over the years (currently learning Python). I love sharing what I learn and learning from others!

name: John Reese
bio: I am a software engineer with a passion for testing. If you have any questions about the track or the language in general, feel free to ask; I'd love to hear them.

name: James Lao
bio: I write mostly C# professionally, but I have a passion for functional programming and lately Rust. I look forward to helping you anyway I can!

name: James Jensen
bio: I love programming, and helping people with programming. You may have seen my StackOverflow contributions under the username StriplingWarrior. I speak English and French.
